LABEL: 0x25
STRING: 「...So, I'm going to wear this, after all.」

LABEL: 0xF1
STRING: I muttered to myself and put on my costume.

LABEL: 0x121
STRING: Fluffy fabric.

LABEL: 0x141
STRING: The inside was made of rubber, and it seemed to be quite water-resistant.

LABEL: 0x183
STRING: Conversely, it was hard to breathe in. A person wearing such a thing in the middle of summer would certainly die...

LABEL: 0x1EB
STRING: It was the macaroni penguin that had been abandoned in the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x22B
STRING: I would breathe life into it by going inside.

LABEL: 0x2D1
STRING: 「It's in case of an emergency.」

LABEL: 0x2FB
STRING: 「That macaroni penguin is the pride and joy of ROMLES, so it's extremely water-resistant.」

LABEL: 0x349
STRING: 「It's surprisingly protective, you know?」

LABEL: 0x384
STRING: As she spoke, Yukari slapped the penguin on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x450
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san, what are you doing?」

LABEL: 0x489
STRING: She looked up at me.

LABEL: 0x4B5
STRING: Her upward glance was nice and all, but the crease between her eyebrows was a little scary.

LABEL: 0x505
STRING: Why was she looking at me like that, though? That's when I realized.

LABEL: 0x545
STRING: I had unconsciously patted Yukari's head.

LABEL: 0x57D
STRING: 「S-Sorry! I didn't mean to!」

LABEL: 0x617
STRING: 「Are you of the same ilk as Hiragino-sensei, unconsciously patting people on the head?!」

LABEL: 0x66C
STRING: 「No, that's not it! It's probably because I'm wearing this costume...」

LABEL: 0x6AC
STRING: 「I think it awakened my paternal instincts...」

LABEL: 0x6E8
STRING: 「For penguins, that is.」

LABEL: 0x71D
STRING: 「What do you mean by "paternal instincts"?! Why are you my father?!」

LABEL: 0x76D
STRING: 「Didn't I tell you to stop treating me like a child?!」

LABEL: 0x7CE
STRING: 「I said it was unconscious. Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x878
STRING: 「Besides! This isn't just a penguin. It's a macaroni penguin! It's totally different!」

LABEL: 0x8D3
STRING: She was like a middle schooler, no matter how you looked at it, casually dissing Hiragino and me with puffed cheeks.

LABEL: 0x930
STRING: I bet Hiragino would get a kick out of me calling Yukari that, instead of Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x992
STRING: I knew that would only serve to anger Yukari more, so I stayed quiet...

LABEL: 0x9F8
STRING: Around the time I fully put on the macaroni penguin and awoke as a costume actor,

LABEL: 0xA52
STRING: the elevator arrived on the first floor.

LABEL: 0xA80
STRING: Inside the elevator was, of course, the MRI.

LABEL: 0xAAF
STRING: Hiragino, who rode with it, carried that huge cylinder to the lobby and brought it directly in front of the bridge.

LABEL: 0xB7D
STRING: 「All right. I'll leave the rest to you.」

LABEL: 0xC02
STRING: 「...You can carry it by yourself, right?」

LABEL: 0xC33
STRING: 「Yeah, I'll figure something out.」

LABEL: 0xC5D
STRING: 「The floor should be flooded in the rear section, so it might be a little more slippery than here.」

LABEL: 0xCCB
STRING: It'd be bad if something happened to Hiragino, a doctor――

LABEL: 0xCFF
STRING: I was allowed to head to the frontlines due to that reasoning.

LABEL: 0xD45
STRING: Everything was ready... From here on out, it was all me.

LABEL: 0xDE7
STRING: I pushed the MRI I received from Hiragino toward the rear section.

LABEL: 0xE36
STRING: It was an unreasonably heavy piece of equipment, but it slid across the wet floor easily enough.

LABEL: 0xE8A
STRING: And so, I passed through the bridge and entered the rear section.

LABEL: 0xECA
STRING: The water level was higher now, and I could feel myself walking through it.

LABEL: 0xF10
STRING: After continuing on a little further, a light stirred in the distance.

LABEL: 0xFA5
STRING: <COOS> was there.

LABEL: 0xFC9
STRING: It was looking at me―at its prey―from close by.

LABEL: 0x100B
STRING: I was in dire straits... but if I activated this, I could turn the tables in one fell swoop.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: I held my hand over the switch on the side of the device and...

LABEL: 0x10E0
STRING: 「...Will this really work?」

LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: I turned it on.

LABEL: 0x1136
STRING: The roaring began again.

LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: I could tell that the pendant in my pocket was shaking like it was being pulled toward the MRI.

LABEL: 0x11B2
STRING: If I had Tokiwa's vision, I was sure my surroundings would look incredibly vivid.

LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: Right here and now, a magnetic field was being generated, centered around the powered-on MRI――

LABEL: 0x1334
STRING: 「Ugh――」

LABEL: 0x134E
STRING: I looked straight ahead.

LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: This appeared to be the home base of <COOS>, which had entered the interior of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x13C1
STRING: Amidst the thunderous roar, a large number of light particles rushed toward me.

LABEL: 0x1403
STRING: It was a horrifyingly beautiful sight, but...

LABEL: 0x1435
STRING: For some reason, their glow... It was uncharacteristically chaotic.

LABEL: 0x1471
STRING: Although they were rushing toward me, only a few of the particles were actually heading straight for me,

LABEL: 0x14D9
STRING: while the rest were moving around in disarray.

LABEL: 0x1521
STRING: Some of them were trying their best to move in a single direction, but it looked like they didn't recognize me at all.

LABEL: 0x15F2
STRING: 「Success...」

LABEL: 0x160E
STRING: I put the MRI in its place and let go.

LABEL: 0x163F
STRING: Yukari's perfect strategy convinced me of my victory.

LABEL: 0x16E1
STRING: <COOS> was a magnetic bacteria.

LABEL: 0x1705
STRING: Which meant that generating a powerful magnetic field from the MRI

LABEL: 0x1740
STRING: would disrupt their "network structure" connecting them to each other.

LABEL: 0x1778
STRING: And above all, it could simultaneously disable their sense of direction.

LABEL: 0x17CC
STRING: We'd be able to quell the threat of <COOS> without killing them using this method.

LABEL: 0x1888
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x18AA
STRING: <COOS> was completely neutralized by the powerful electromagnet.

LABEL: 0x198C
STRING: In the meantime, I leisurely made my way to the warehouse while wearing my macaroni penguin costume.

LABEL: 0x19E0
STRING: The warehouse in the rear section――

LABEL: 0x1A00
STRING: Right... This was where Reiri had collapsed.

LABEL: 0x1A38
STRING: Just when we were convinced that everyone was dead, there she was――

LABEL: 0x1A92
STRING: I naturally recalled the moment I'd discovered her, but this was no time for sentimentality.

LABEL: 0x1AEC
STRING: 「The messenger buoy...」

LABEL: 0x1B14
STRING: I pushed the cardboard boxes away and tried to find one――

LABEL: 0x1B42
STRING: It immediately caught my eye.

LABEL: 0x1B6A
STRING: It was a long, slender, and sturdy-looking buoy.

LABEL: 0x1B98
STRING: A large lump of vivid orange. There was a thing wire wrapped around the cylinder.

LABEL: 0x1BF0
STRING: Since it had to be visible while floating in the sea,

LABEL: 0x1C34
STRING: it had to have a presence that was striking from any angle.

LABEL: 0x1C84
STRING: 「...All right!」

LABEL: 0x1CA0
STRING: 「Wait, really?」

LABEL: 0x1CC4
STRING: I found the buoy so easily that I couldn't help but voice my doubts.

LABEL: 0x1D22
STRING: Suddenly, my downturned eyes caught something strange through the macaroni penguin's eyes.

LABEL: 0x1D74
STRING: Crouching down with the messenger buoy in one hand, I grabbed it as it reflected the glittering lights.

LABEL: 0x1E44
STRING: These were... glasses, right?

LABEL: 0x1E66
STRING: No, that was wrong.

LABEL: 0x1E80
STRING: When I held them up in front of me and looked closely, it was obvious that they were more than mere glasses.

LABEL: 0x1ED6
STRING: A sturdy-looking frame.

LABEL: 0x1EF8
STRING: And multiple switches on the rim of the lens――

LABEL: 0x1FD4
STRING: 「Smart glasses...」

LABEL: 0x1FF8
STRING: It was a smart device that was prohibited inside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x2051
STRING: Why was something like this lying inside the warehouse?

LABEL: 0x208F
STRING: Since they were here, did that mean more of these were loaded along with the cargo?

LABEL: 0x20D7
STRING: However, I didn't see any kind of packing material, and it was odd that only one pair of them had fallen to the floor.

LABEL: 0x2147
STRING: Were these someone's personal belongings?

LABEL: 0x216F
STRING: If so, whose?

LABEL: 0x2199
STRING: How did they bring them in?

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: Still harboring a mountain of questions, I firmly grasped the glasses in my hand and headed back to the front section.

LABEL: 0x25EF
STRING: 「It was a success!」

LABEL: 0x2612
STRING: Yukari came running up to me while saying that.

LABEL: 0x26A1
STRING: I instinctively reached out my hand to pat her head, but it was smacked away in no time at all.

LABEL: 0x26EF
STRING: ...It hurt.

LABEL: 0x2721
STRING: Touri, Reiri, Tokiwa, and Hiragino followed soon after, and from their smiles, I was further convinced that this plan would succeed.

LABEL: 0x2858
STRING: 「That's Katagiri-san for you!」

LABEL: 0x28E9
STRING: 「It's just like when you saved Reiri... Right, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x2991
STRING: 「Yeah, yeah. Amazing as usual.」

LABEL: 0x29BA
STRING: Touri was talking to Reiri in an excited manner, but she brushed her off in annoyance.

LABEL: 0x2A14
STRING: She looked truly irritated, but let's just think of this scene as heart-warming.

LABEL: 0x2A5E
STRING: Maybe it was simply my imagination, but I could see some softness in Reiri's expression as well.

LABEL: 0x2B94
STRING: 「It's all coming to an end―everything.」

LABEL: 0x2C47
STRING: 「It's taken a long time... hasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x2C76
STRING: To whom was Tokiwa's question directed at?

LABEL: 0x2CEA
STRING: But, "a long time," huh?

LABEL: 0x2D12
STRING: More than two full days had passed since the <SHEEP III> had sunk.

LABEL: 0x2D4E
STRING: And now, we finally had a plan to escape.

LABEL: 0x2D78
STRING: How many times had we been convinced of our success, how many times had we failed, and how many times had we been betrayed?

LABEL: 0x2DC6
STRING: Considering everything that had happened, putting it into a single phrase like "a long time" didn't seem fitting.

LABEL: 0x2E22
STRING: Yukari was staring at the messenger buoy she had received from me, the macaroni penguin.

LABEL: 0x2EF2
STRING: 「It's embarrassing to admit,

LABEL: 0x2F3D
STRING: but I had no idea the <SHEEP III> was loaded with such anachronistic equipment.」

LABEL: 0x2F80
STRING: Yukari sounded somewhat puzzled.

LABEL: 0x2FAA
STRING: Beside her, Reiri looked disinterested but spoke in a voice that everyone could hear.

LABEL: 0x30C7
STRING: 「It was probably here just as an emergency measure.」

LABEL: 0x312D
STRING: 「Who'd have thought it would get any use on the maiden voyage?」

LABEL: 0x3167
STRING: 「That said, I can't believe that even you, the chief attendant, didn't know of its existence.」

LABEL: 0x320E
STRING: 「It seems like it really was just "loaded" here. ROMLES aren't good at thinking ahead, are they?」

LABEL: 0x32E3
STRING: As Reiri shrugged her shoulders in exasperation, Yukari had nothing to say in response.

LABEL: 0x3325
STRING: I guess her bad habit of ruining the mood after we had just found the buoy couldn't be helped.

LABEL: 0x33BD
STRING: However, I wasn't going to let her every word bother me.

LABEL: 0x3411
STRING: We had finally obtained a means of reaching the surface.

LABEL: 0x34B5
STRING: We were finally going to be... saved.

LABEL: 0x34E5
STRING: Many mysteries had been solved.

LABEL: 0x3509
STRING: The truth from seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x3525
STRING: <Alice> and <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x3549
STRING: The experiment ROMLES had conducted in Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x3575
STRING: ...And, we would return to the surface.

LABEL: 0x35A3
STRING: Up until now, I had thought that everything would end after we'd escape.

LABEL: 0x364E
STRING: But that wasn't true.

LABEL: 0x3672
STRING: Now that we knew everything, we had to start over again.

LABEL: 0x36B6
STRING: Twisted ecosystems and human relationships.

LABEL: 0x36E6
STRING: Incidents and accidents.

LABEL: 0x3700
STRING: It was all over, and there were a lot of things that couldn't be undone.

LABEL: 0x373E
STRING: Even if one was to take responsibility for this and the accident seven years ago, what was lost would not return.

LABEL: 0x37F7
STRING: But even so, we had to move forward.

LABEL: 0x3845
STRING: We couldn't stay here forever.

LABEL: 0x39D2
STRING: 「All right. Let's send the buoy up to the surface!」

LABEL: 0x3A72
STRING: 「Yes, let's!」

LABEL: 0x3A9B
STRING: Yukari clenched her fist tightly while holding the buoy carefully, and then――

LABEL: 0x3B65
STRING: 「...How are we going to do that?」

LABEL: 0x3BB8
STRING: ...Huh?

LABEL: 0x3BCE
STRING: What the hell?

LABEL: 0x3BEA
STRING: To face such a fundamental problem after coming this far――

LABEL: 0x3CC1
STRING: 「...We can eject it from the laboratory.」

LABEL: 0x3D5A
STRING: 「You guys really are naive, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x3D9C
STRING: Her tone was clearly mocking.

LABEL: 0x3DE8
STRING: Yukari, who had endured it earlier, finally took damage from Reiri's abuse, and her expression hardened.

LABEL: 0x3E44
STRING: Hiragino patted her completely frozen head.

LABEL: 0x3E82
STRING: Without the energy to brush off his hand, she nodded and followed Reiri as she began to walk away.

LABEL: 0x3EDC
STRING: ...What a pitiful sight.

LABEL: 0x3F78
STRING: "Incompetent" seemed to be a magic word for her,

LABEL: 0x3FB6
STRING: but anyone who took on the role of the chief of a submarine at her age had to be exceptional.

LABEL: 0x4010
STRING: Reiri kept on berating her from an outside viewpoint as if she didn't know that.

LABEL: 0x405C
STRING: She was probably elated by the fact that the messenger buoy she insisted "had to be there"

LABEL: 0x40BC
STRING: was actually found and was the key to our escape.

LABEL: 0x40FA
STRING: That was why there was no mercy in her words since earlier.

LABEL: 0x419D
STRING: Led by Reiri, we headed for the laboratory where the buoy was to be ejected.

LABEL: 0x42F4
STRING: 「I'll set the buoy.」

LABEL: 0x4341
STRING: Yukari didn't listen to me as she held the buoy in front of her body.

LABEL: 0x4383
STRING: I had offered to hold it for her since it looked like she was having trouble walking with it.

LABEL: 0x43C1
STRING: And so, despite Reiri's intermittent verbal abuse, Yukari set the buoy up at the ejection point with her own hands.

LABEL: 0x44BC
STRING: 「Hey, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x4558
STRING: Yes. I'm fine...」

LABEL: 0x457C
STRING: 「There. It's set.」

LABEL: 0x45A9
STRING: After struggling for a while with her back to us, Yukari closed the ejection port and looked back at us.

LABEL: 0x462E
STRING: 「Sorry for the wait... It's perfect.」

LABEL: 0x4670
STRING: 「So we can eject it like this.」

LABEL: 0x4701
STRING: 「Paleozoic technology. It couldn't be simpler, could it?」

LABEL: 0x4746
STRING: Reiri sounded satisfied.

LABEL: 0x477C
STRING: Since the ejection port was connected to the outside, it was sealed tightly, although not as tightly as the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x47BB
STRING: It wasn't possible to see inside it.

LABEL: 0x4819
STRING: 「Now then... All that's left is to eject the buoy.」

LABEL: 0x48BB
STRING: 「Yeah, about that.」

LABEL: 0x48DD
STRING: 「It's not every day you get a chance to use such an antiquated piece of equipment.」

LABEL: 0x491F
STRING: 「I'll do it.」

LABEL: 0x4948
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x495E
STRING: Reiri spoke without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x4986
STRING: And just like that... she fired it.

LABEL: 0x49B6
STRING: Launching the buoy bearing our hopes and dreams toward the surface――

LABEL: 0x49FC
STRING: With all our thoughts and wishes inside... Wasn't that how it was supposed to be?

LABEL: 0x4ADC
STRING: Everyone was stunned.

LABEL: 0x4AFA
STRING: But... Yes.

LABEL: 0x4B1C
STRING: If this meant we could escape, then there was nothing more to say.

LABEL: 0x4B5A
STRING: They said you should move with haste when in doubt.

LABEL: 0x4B7A
STRING: It was also true that it would be too late to take action if another problem occurred.

LABEL: 0x4BBC
STRING: Her straightforwardness had shocked me, but to reproach Reiri was probably a mistake.

LABEL: 0x4D3C
STRING: 「Whaaat? That's not fair!」

LABEL: 0x4DD1
STRING: 「Now, if we're saved, you'll have me to thank.」

LABEL: 0x4E0C
STRING: She had the same smirk on her face as always, but she seemed to be enjoying herself a little more than usual.

LABEL: 0x4E6A
STRING: So she was a high schooler after all, huh?

LABEL: 0x4F71
STRING: 「Now, all that's left is to wait――」

LABEL: 0x4FA5
STRING: 「The buoy has a sonic transmitter to determine its distance from the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x5019
STRING: 「In that case, let's go to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x5395
STRING: As soon as we got to the wheelhouse, we pulled up a large image of the buoy's altitude on one of the monitors.

LABEL: 0x53DB
STRING: A simple diagram and some figures were displayed beside it.

LABEL: 0x540D
STRING: The numbers were high, but we could see the buoy rising steadily.

LABEL: 0x5465
STRING: Slowly and steadily, we were creating a connection between us and the surface.

LABEL: 0x54B3
STRING: Like a spider's thread.

LABEL: 0x54DF
STRING: A single ray of hope connecting the sea floor and the ground――

LABEL: 0x5581
STRING: ...Finally, we'd be saved.

LABEL: 0x55A5
STRING: We had spent these long days at the bottom of the sea together.

LABEL: 0x55CB
STRING: Yukari――

LABEL: 0x55DF
STRING: Hiragino――

LABEL: 0x55F5
STRING: Tokiwa――

LABEL: 0x560D
STRING: Touri――

LABEL: 0x5623
STRING: Reiri――

LABEL: 0x5639
STRING: Hikari――

LABEL: 0x564F
STRING: The fact that so many people were killed wouldn't go away―but we had survived.

LABEL: 0x569B
STRING: It still didn't feel real to me, but there was nothing barring our path now.

LABEL: 0x5738
STRING: From the dark sea to the blue sky.

LABEL: 0x575C
STRING: The bright orange color of the buoy floating on the sea would attract the eyes of ROMLES and the general public alike.

LABEL: 0x57BC
STRING: Once that thing reached the surface of the sea, ROMLES could no longer ignore the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x5815
STRING: No matter how much effort it took, they had no choice but to help.

LABEL: 0x58AE
STRING: Help was on the way――

LABEL: 0x58CA
STRING: We'd be saved――

LABEL: 0x5DBD
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x5DDA
STRING: At that moment, the monitor went haywire.

LABEL: 0x5E04
STRING: The values indicating our distance from the buoy and the water depth fluctuated wildly in 10-meter increments.

LABEL: 0x5E56
STRING: 「What the hell's going on...?」

LABEL: 0x5EAE
STRING: The numbers jumped up and down violently.

LABEL: 0x5ECE
STRING: It didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x5EEE
STRING: The numbers kept changing

LABEL: 0x5F12
STRING: at a rapid pace,

LABEL: 0x5F32
STRING: multiplying over time,

LABEL: 0x5F4A
STRING: and before long...

LABEL: 0x5FE7
STRING: 「...It stopped.」

LABEL: 0x600E
STRING: The numbers disappeared.

LABEL: 0x602C
STRING: In their place were English letters in red.

LABEL: 0x6066
STRING: 『Unmeasurable』――

LABEL: 0x609D
STRING: 「The wire connecting the buoy to the <SHEEP III>...」

LABEL: 0x60D4
STRING: 「...has been cut.」

LABEL: 0x60F5
STRING: Silence fell over the wheelhouse.
